revised_title: Gordon Morgan Holmes: A Pioneering Neurologist and Medical Educator
tldr: Gordon Morgan Holmes was a renowned Irish neurologist and medical educator who made significant contributions to the study of the human nervous system. He worked at the National Hospital for Nervous Diseases for over three decades and served as a consultant during World War I. Holmes was a respected teacher and researcher, and his work in neurology and medical education earned him international recognition and numerous honors.
